address: 2200 North Ocean Boulevard, Myrtle Beach, SC, USA

nearbyCategories.category: Delicious Dining Experiences near Myrtle Beach's Oceanfront
nearbyCategories.description: Enjoy a variety of dining options within a short walk or drive. From casual beachfront cafes to upscale restaurants, many are within 5-10 minutes driving. Try 'Sea Captain's House' or 'Magnolia's at 26th' for a memorable meal.
notable_places: Dirty Don's Oyster Bar and Grill
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the interior of a popular Myrtle Beach restaurant with a view of the ocean, featuring elegantly set tables, happy diners, and a bustling atmosphere.

nearbyCategories.category: Convenient Coffee Shops and Cafes for Your Morning Start
nearbyCategories.description: Start your day with a coffee and pastry at one of the nearby cafes, many within a 5-minute drive. 'Dunkin' and 'Starbucks' are easily accessible for your caffeine fix.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a cozy coffee shop interior with sunlight streaming through the windows, showcasing a barista preparing a latte, patrons relaxing with their drinks, and shelves filled with coffee beans and mugs.

nearbyCategories.category: Must-See Tourist Attractions in Myrtle Beach
nearbyCategories.description: Explore the many attractions Myrtle Beach has to offer, most within a 10-20 minute drive. Visit 'Broadway at the Beach' or the 'Myrtle Beach SkyWheel' for entertainment and stunning views.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the Myrtle Beach SkyWheel at sunset, brightly lit against the twilight sky, with the beach and ocean visible in the background, and tourists taking pictures.

nearbyCategories.category: Thrilling Recreational Activities for the Whole Family
nearbyCategories.description: Enjoy a range of recreational activities, with miniature golf, water parks, and amusement parks just a short drive away (5-15 minutes). Check out 'Myrtle Waves Water Park' or 'Family Kingdom Amusement Park'.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a water park with colorful slides, splashing water, and happy families enjoying the rides under a sunny sky.

nearbyCategories.category: Retail Therapy: Shopping Destinations Near the Beach
nearbyCategories.description: Find everything you need at the nearby shopping centers, outlets, and malls, typically within a 15-minute drive. Visit 'Tanger Outlets' or 'Coastal Grand Mall' for a wide selection of stores.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a bustling outdoor shopping mall with palm trees, vibrant storefronts, shoppers carrying bags, and a sunny atmosphere.

nearbyCategories.category: Convenient Grocery Stores and Essential Supplies
nearbyCategories.description: Easily stock up on groceries and essentials at the nearby stores, usually within a 5-10 minute drive. 'Walmart' and 'Publix' are readily available.
notable_places: Publix Super Market at Myrtle Beach
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a well-stocked grocery store aisle with fresh produce, colorful packaging, and shoppers browsing the shelves.

nearbyCategories.category: Easy Access Transportation Options Around Myrtle Beach
nearbyCategories.description: Getting around is easy with the Myrtle Beach International Airport only a 15-20 minute drive away. Car rentals are also readily available. Local bus services are also available.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of Myrtle Beach International Airport exterior on a sunny day, with airplanes taking off and landing in the background, and travelers arriving and departing.

nearbyCategories.category: Essential Vacation Services: Pharmacies and Healthcare
nearbyCategories.description: Access essential services like pharmacies within a short drive (5-10 minutes). 'CVS' and 'Walgreens' provide convenience for prescriptions and healthcare needs.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a clean and well-lit pharmacy interior with shelves stocked with medications and personal care products, and a pharmacist assisting a customer.

nearbyCategories.category: Beach Access Points and Oceanfront Activities
nearbyCategories.description: Enjoy direct beach access from the boulevard and surrounding areas. The public beach is readily accessible within walking distance. Consider renting chairs and umbrellas for a relaxing day. Many local businesses offer these services.
nearbyCategories.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a sunny beach scene in Myrtle Beach, featuring clear blue water, white sand, beach umbrellas, sunbathers, and children playing in the waves.
